blogPost.excerpt: www.realsy.app is a productivity tool for realtors to better stay organized with their listings by combining to-do’s, expenses, and notes all organized in one place.
blogPost.body: www.realsy.app is a productivity tool for realtors to better stay organized with their listings by combining to-do’s, expenses, and notes all organized in one place.
blogPost.title: Realsy for Realtors - Stay on top of your listings.
blogPost.author: Nathan Beatty

localize.description: www.realsy.app 是一个生产力工具，为房地产经纪人更好地保持与他们的房源组织，结合待办事项，费用和笔记在一个地方组织。
www.realsy.app 是一個生產力工具，爲房地產經紀人更好地保持與他們的房源組織，結合待辦事項，費用和筆記在一個地方組織。

previous.excerpt: Sivo provides debt as a service. Our API allows companies to access debt funding and lend money to their users at scale. Sivo is backed by Y Combinator (W21).
previous.title: Sivo - Access debt funding and lend money to users at scale

localize.description: Sivo提供债务即服务。我们的API允许企业获得债务融资，并大规模地借钱给用户。Sivo得到了Y Combinator（W21）的支持。
localize.tagline: 获取债务资金，规模化借贷给用户

localize.description: Sivo提供債務即服務。我們的API允許企業獲得債務融資，並大規模地借錢給用戶。Sivo得到了Y Combinator（W21）的支持。
localize.tagline: 獲取債務資金，規模化借貸給用戶

next.excerpt: Generate a 3D character that looks very similar to you with just three photos. Apply different ready-made animations to the model and record some fun, attractive videos with it in Augmented Reality.
next.title: Highavenue - Generate a 3D model that looks like you & apply AR effects

localize.description: 只需三张照片就能生成一个与你非常相似的3D角色。将不同的现成动画应用到模型上，并在增强现实中用它录制一些有趣、有吸引力的视频。
localize.tagline: 生成一个看起来像你的3D模型，并应用AR效果。

localize.description: 只需三張照片就能生成一個與你非常相似的3D角色。將不同的現成動畫應用到模型上，並在增強現實中用它錄製一些有趣、有吸引力的視頻。
localize.tagline: 生成一個看起來像你的3D模型，並應用AR效果。
